skills.name: Graceful Touch
skills.description: Attacks with a graceful touch and possesses the enemy with a 30% chance to increase the enemy's chances to land a Glancing Hit for 2 turns.
skills.level_progress_description:
Damage +5%
Damage +5%
Effect Rate +10%
Damage +10%
Effect Rate +10%

skill_effect.name: Glancing Hit
skill_effect.description: Accuracy is reduced by 50% and the chance for the monster to land a Glancing Hit of reduced damage will increase.

skills.name: Blade Fan
skills.description: Throws a fan to attack the enemy 3 times, with each attack having a 50% chance to remove one of the enemy's beneficial effect. Increases the Attack Bar of all allies by 15% each per beneficial effect removed. The damage is proportionate to the attack speed.

skill_effect.name: Increase ATB
skill_effect.description: The ATK bar of ally monsters is filled by a set amount. This allows ally monsters to attack again sooner.

skill_effect.name: Multiple Hits
skill_effect.description: Attack hits more than 1 time per use.

skill_effect.name: Remove Buff
skill_effect.description: Removes one or more beneficial effects from target monster(s)

skills.name: Charge Vitality
skills.description: Fills up the Attack Bar of an ally target and yourself and recovers HP by 50%.

skill_effect.name: Increase ATB
skill_effect.description: The ATK bar of ally monsters is filled by a set amount. This allows ally monsters to attack again sooner.
